imdb.plot outline: Gafas e Pallaso are two characters of a reality that is not governed by the same parameters as ours. The contact with other forms of life resulting from the free intergalactic transit and the miscegenation that this entails, as well as the peculiar religious idols or hegemonic alcoholic beverages whose image is a football myth, not to mention rare parallel worlds or space-time flirtations , Demonstrate what we say. The protagonists are the best proof of this: a clown of race who comes from another planet with a magic band, and an individual whose sunglasses are part of him as his chest hairs. Within this cosmology we can consider various particular and picturesque species and individuals, but also a series of everyday elements that make up a whole with a characteristic and identifiable personality: a monopolistic beer whose corporate image is the legendary porter Oliver Kahn, Excellence, a somewhat special religion - ingredients that impregnate and uniquely characterize the world in which the stories of the series pass.
imdb.title: Gafas e Pallaso
plot: _Gafas e Pallaso_ (qv) are two characters of a reality that is not governed by the same parameters as ours. The contact with other forms of life resulting from the free intergalactic transit and the miscegenation that this entails, as well as the peculiar religious idols or hegemonic alcoholic beverages whose image is a football myth, not to mention rare parallel worlds or space-time flirtations , Demonstrate what we say. The protagonists are the best proof of this: a clown of race who comes from another planet with a magic band, and an individual whose sunglasses are part of him as his chest hairs. Within this cosmology we can consider various particular and picturesque species and individuals, but also a series of everyday elements that make up a whole with a characteristic and identifiable personality: a monopolistic beer whose corporate image is the legendary porter Oliver Kahn, Excellence, a somewhat special religion - ingredients that impregnate and uniquely characterize the world in which the stories of the series pass.::Bruno
